meta.title: Arithmetic Fluid Diagnostics: Empirical Evidence for Density, Pressure, and Shock Structure on ‚Ñï
meta.subtitle: Computational Framework for Arithmetic Dynamics
meta.author: Zelenka_D_D

citations.cite_as: Zelenka, D. D. (2026). Arithmetic Fluid Diagnostics: Empirical Evidence for Density, Pressure, and Shock Structure on ‚Ñï. GitHub repository.

abstract: We introduce an empirical framework treating the positive integers as a compressible arithmetic fluid, where composite structure induces effective density, pressure, viscosity, entropy, and shock-like behavior. Using operationally defined observables derived from prime factorization statistics, we construct a discrete fluid state over ‚Ñï and analyze its large-scale behavior. We show that these quantities are finite, structured, and strongly coupled, with singular release events associated with primes. This work establishes a diagnostic foundation for arithmetic dynamics without invoking probabilistic randomness assumptions.

core_thesis.ontological_claim: Positive integers ‚Ñï support a compressible arithmetic fluid
core_thesis.mechanism: Composite structure induces effective dynamical fields
core_thesis.methodology: Operational definitions from prime factorization, no probabilistic assumptions
core_thesis.significance: Primes as structural release events in coherent dynamical medium

arithmetic_fluid_state_variables.state_vector: X(n) = (œÅ, v, a, p, ŒΩ, H, œÉ, R, C, Œ©)

rho.name: Density
rho.definition: Composite load induced by prime factorization

Omega.name: Total Prime Factors
Omega.definition: Number of prime factors with multiplicity

key_findings.finite_observables: All quantities remain finite and well-behaved across sampled domain
key_findings.nontrivial_structure: Clear coupling between density and pressure (equation of state)
key_findings.entropy_bounded_away_from_zero: Distribution peaked away from 0, indicating persistent complexity
key_findings.heavy_tailed_viscosity: Wide rigidity range with intermittent high-viscosity states
key_findings.shock_release_correlation: Sharp reorganizations coincident with release events
key_findings.prime_association: Release events strongly associated with prime occurrences
key_findings.stratification_by_omega: Attractor-like layers in density-entropy space stratified by Œ©(n)

data_construction.methodology: Deterministic computation from prime factorization data
data_construction.computational_range: Integers n up to computational limit (see code repository)
data_construction.reproducibility: All code and data available in GitHub repository
data_construction.verification: Multiple independent computational runs confirm stability

pressure_density_coupling.observation: Clear correlation between p(n) and œÅ(n)

entropy_shock_coupling.observation: Higher entropy correlated with stronger shocks

compression_release_exclusion.observation: Absence of simultaneous high compression and high release

release_events.interpretation: Analogous to pressure release in physical systems

threshold_behavior.observation: Sharp boundary in compression-release phase space

omega_layers.observation: Attractor-like layers in arithmetic state space
omega_layers.interpretation: Different Œ© values correspond to distinct dynamical regimes

threading_geometry.analogy: Energy locked in 2D subspaces in incompressible flow

unified_operational_implications.claim: Arithmetic fluid provides unifying substrate for fundamental problems

navier_stokes.connection: Stratification by Œ©(n) reflects threading geometry; viscosity ŒΩ and pressure p provide sufficient constraint for regularity
navier_stokes.mechanism: Projection penalty prevents blowup in restricted geometry

collatz.connection: Entropy H and shock strength œÉ provide mechanism for Conformal Mixing Lemma
collatz.mechanism: '+1' operation acts as structural shock, resets arithmetic state, forces sampling of dissipative density

riemann_hypothesis.connection: Primes as release events in arithmetic fluid; zeros at operational gradient minima
riemann_hypothesis.mechanism: Self-adjointness and weight calibration only achieved at œÉ=1/2; off-line zeros incur unbounded reconstruction cost

p_neq_np.connection: Composite load and viscosity are arithmetic analogs of computational complexity
p_neq_np.mechanism: Non-isentropic fluid; coordination cost of search >> verification
p_neq_np.claim: Structural irreducibility of state space forbids polynomial shortcuts

unified_operational_implications.unifying_principle: Geometry of operation dictates limits of system

key_observations.coherent_medium: Arithmetic is not isolated points but coherent dynamical medium
key_observations.finite_stable_observables: All fluid variables remain finite and stable
key_observations.no_randomness_assumption: All features emerge deterministically from factorization

interpretation.primes_as_release_events: Primes provide structural reset in arithmetic fluid
interpretation.viscosity_as_rigidity: Resistance to reconfiguration varies with structure
interpretation.shock_as_discontinuity: Sharp transitions in local arithmetic geometry

diagnostic_foundation.purpose: Establish empirical basis for arithmetic dynamics theory

future_work.invariant_identification: Discover conserved quantities in arithmetic flow
future_work.analytic_connections: Link to classical results (PNT, RH, etc.)
future_work.theoretical_derivation: Derive fluid equations from first principles

entropy_distribution.observation: Peaked distribution, bounded away from zero

compression_release.observation: Sharp exclusion boundary, no simultaneous high C and R

entropy_shock.observation: Positive correlation, higher H ‚Üí higher œÉ

one_sentence_summary: The positive integers form a coherent arithmetic fluid with empirically measurable density, pressure, viscosity, entropy, and shock structure‚Äîall derived deterministically from prime factorization‚Äîwhere primes act as structural release events and the observed stratification provides the dynamical substrate unifying solutions to Navier-Stokes regularity, Collatz convergence, Riemann zeros, and P‚â†NP complexity.

philosophical_implications.determinism: No randomness assumption‚Äîall structure emerges from factorization
philosophical_implications.emergence: Fluid properties emerge from discrete arithmetic operations
philosophical_implications.unity: Single framework connects disparate mathematical domains
